channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Federal appeals court judge is accused of bullying her clerks

item.title: Trump says US hit 'big facility' linked to alleged Venezuelan drug boats
item.description: The US president would not confirm US media reports that the explosion was caused by a CIA drone strike.

item.title: Anthony Joshua injured in Nigeria car crash that killed two team members
item.description: The British heavyweight boxer suffered minor injuries in the crash, which killed two team members and close friends.

item.title: The U.S. offers Ukraine a 15-year security guarantee for now, Zelenskyy says

item.title: K-pop band NewJeans breaks up after bitter feud with record label
item.description: Ador says it has dropped NewJeans member Danielle Marsh while the return of Minji remains uncertain.

item.title: FIFA president defends World Cup ticket prices, saying demand is hitting records

item.title: Why Israel's recognition of Somaliland as an independent state is controversial
item.description: Somaliland wants international recognition - here's why, and what could have driven Israel to recognise it now.

item.title: Turkey detains 357 suspected IS members in nationwide raids
item.description: The arrests come just a day after three police officers were killed during a siege in the town of Yalova.
